title.en: Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound

altTitles.en: Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound

altTitles.pt-br: A vingança do cão de caça de sangue de ferro Baskerville

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title.en: The Outcast Is Too Good at Martial Arts

altTitles.en: The Bullied One Is Too Good at Fighting

altTitles.es-la: El acosado es demasiado bueno luchando

description.en:
Martial artist Cha Moo-yeol falls for President Chang's manipulations and becomes a vegetable while competing in mixed martial arts. He is then used by the chairman as part of Jang's makeover. When he finally dies, he is possessed by the body of a high school student of the same name.
A hard body with S-class durability. A status bar ability that allows him to improve his martial arts skills, but this time it's different.
With his unfulfilled dream of becoming the strongest, he begins the fight for revenge against the president.
description.es-la:
El artista marcial Cha Moo-yeol cae en las manipulaciones del presidente Chang y se convierte en un vegetal mientras compite en artes marciales mixtas. Luego es utilizado por el presidente como parte de un cambio de imagen de Jang. Cuando finalmente muere, es poseído por el cuerpo de un estudiante de instituto del mismo nombre.
Un cuerpo duro con durabilidad de clase S. Una habilidad de barra de estado que le permite mejorar sus habilidades en artes marciales, pero esta vez es diferente.
Con su sueño incumplido de convertirse en el más fuerte, comienza la lucha por la venganza contra el presidente.

description.en: “Look and you’ll die.” “Post a message and you’ll be cursed.” Horror begins to spread with the use of smartphones. Introducing a new series filled with mystery about the horrors of social media!
description.es-la: "Mira y morirás". “Publica un mensaje y serás maldecido”. El horror comienza a extenderse con el uso de los teléfonos inteligentes. ¡Presentamos una nueva serie llena de misterio sobre los horrores de las redes sociales!

description.en:
On the day he was rejected by the company he had devoted his life to,
He went back to the moment of his first day at work. Kim Cheol-su, a low-spec rookie employee who joined Han-young, a leading domestic company. Can he finally achieve his long-desired position as the ‘CEO’ in this lifetime?

Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

altTitles.es-la: GUERRA EN EL JARDIN DE INFANTES

description.en:
Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!

Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?!

Dive into this action-packed rom-com as it unfolds inside the world’s "safest" kindergarten!
description.tr: Bu anaokulunda dünyanın en önemli isimlerinin çocukları eğitim görmektedir; politikacılar, şirket başkanları, petrol kralları, aklınıza ne gelirse! Efsanevi eski suikastçı Rita, özgürlük karşılığında anaokulundaki çocukları suikastlardan korumak için gizli bir göreve atanır!? Dünyanın "en güvenli" anaokulu hakkında bir Aksiyon/Komedi hikayesi!
description.es-la: RESUMEN RAPIDO: encargados de una jardín infantil, son asesinos profesionales y los cuidan con el fin de reducir sus condenas, si logran protegerlos en X tiempo, podrán ser libre pero ¿lo lograran?

description.en: A genius boy who had everything taken away in the name of the law. Dagon, the demon who murdered his father, has become the chairman of a global automobile company comparable to Tesla... and what was taken away by law is regained by law! Hae-seong Yoon becomes a lawyer and begins to gather suspicious people. Can a law firm with only two employees take down Yang Dagon, the tycoon who controls Korea?

He had gone through tens, hundreds of reincarnations. From being the Ultimate Martial Emperor to conquering everything under the heavens, he had accomplished it all. All he wanted now was to finally rest, but the darn cycle of reincarnation just wouldn't end!
In his latest reincarnation, he found himself as 'Seok Jin-ho', the youngest son of the Seok family – the most prominent merchant clan in the Central Plains.
Born into a wealthy family, he thought about leading a simple and carefree life, but the will remaining in his body conveys a final wish.
It crave to prove itself!
"Very well, I will fulfill your wish. But in my own way!"

I, Hayato, once met an Oni princess when I was young, and I made a promise to marry her when I became eighteen. But after that day, I was predisposed to experiencing ecchi disasters whenever I touch women. With the cause unknown, I intended to live out my life in high school without ever finding a girlfriend. But on that fateful day, Sakura, the Oni princess grown up, came back as promised.  
  
This is the tale of an Oni Princess x High School Boy and the mystery of the ecchi Curse Charm that circles them.

altTitles.ja: モンスターシュタイン

description.en:
A few decades back, humanity went to war against strange beings such as werewolves and witches, and was on the verge of defeat.

The solution to breaking this deadlock was the human weapon created by Dr. Frankenstein. Time passes, and Vic, a mysterious girl, is traveling with Stein, a large man covered in scars.

All in order to destroy the distorted principles of this world.
description.ja: 十数年前、人狼や魔女など異形の存在との戦争に挑んだ人類は敗北の危機を迎える。その局面を打開したのはフランケンシュタイン博士が生み出した人間兵器――。時は流れ、謎多き少女ヴィクは、傷だらけの大男シュタインと旅をしていた。すべてはこの世界の歪んだ理を破壊するために。

title.en: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Tidak Ada Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

description.en:
Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=751168)

---
**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/drama/a-mans-man/list?title_no=2876), [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nanzihan/list?title_no=1548), [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/city-office/a-mans-man/list?title_no=3278),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/the-man/list?title_no=2257), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001100)
description.ru: Хан Ю Хён, лучший офисный работник на небесах и на земле. Потеряв все, он вернулся в прошлое и изменил свою жизнь!

description.en:
It is the year 20XX. Earth has been assaulted by monsters known as 'the Enemy of Humanity'. In order to deal with this threat, special schools comprised of teenagers with extraordinary abilities were formed. These people, who came to be known as 'the Talented', have abilities that defy the rules of reality. Among these superpowered individuals was an outlier, someone who was sent to one of these schools despite having no innate special abilities whatsoever. This is the story of our protagonist, who attempts to defeat the Enemies of Humanity through the use of intelligence and manipulation.  

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Doki-Doki](https://www.doki-doki.fr/manga-talentless-volume-1-9782818945223.html)
description.ms: Pada tahun 20XX, Bumi telah diserang oleh raksasa yang dikenali sebagai "musuh umat manusia". Dalam untuk menandingi ancaman dari mereka, satu sekolah khas telah dibentukkan bagi mengumpul golongan budak dengan kebolehan istimewa. Mereka dikenali sebagai orang yang "berbakat" dengan kebolehan melawan hukum realiti. Di kalangan orang dengan kuasa luar biasa ini, ada seseorang telah dihantar ke sekolah ini dengan tanpa ada kebolehan istimewa atau apa-apa pun. Ini adalah cerita di mana protagonis, yang cuba melawan musuh umat manusia dengan cara cerdik dan manupulasi sendiri.
description.ru: 50 лет назад на Землю явились "враги человечества". Чтобы противостоять им, были собраны дети со сверхспособностями и отправлены в школу на одиноком острове далеко в море. Один из них, Накадзима Нанао, упорно продолжает скрывать свою способность, из-за чего его прозвали "бездарем". Тем временем в класс Нанао переводятся двое учеников — Онодэра Кёя и Хираги Нана. Кёя, как и Нанао, скрывает свою способность, а Нана заявляет, что умеет читать мысли людей. Какие изменения принесут двое переведённых учеников этой школе?

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Cheon Sunwoo, a timid, fearful student, gains the ability to see the future.
If one cannot avoid fate, then stand against that fate.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10442873)
description.ko:
겁 많은 학생 천선우에게
 미래를 보는 능력이 생긴다
 운명을 피할 수 없다면
 그 운명에 맞서라

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

title.en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

title.en: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Boukenroku ~Jichou wo Shiranai Kamigami no Shito~

altTitles.en: Adventure Record of Reincarnated Aristocrat ~ The apostle of Gods Who Doesn’t Know Self-Restraint~
Wonderful adventure in Another world! "God... That's going too far!!" he said...

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族の異世界冒険録 ～自重を知らない神々の使徒～

altTitles.en: Chronicles of an Aristocrat Reborn in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Bōken-roku ~ Jichō o Shiranai Kamigami no Shito ~

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่เป็นขุนนางไปผจญภัยในต่างโลก ~อัครฑูตจอมซุ่มซ่ามของทวยเทพ~

altTitles.zh: 转生贵族的异世界冒险录

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族的異世界冒險錄

altTitles.en: The Aristocrat’s Otherworldly Adventure: Serving Gods Who Go Too Far

description.en:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her. [Kodansha]
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

altTitles.ja: 異世界日本～暗殺一家の三男は異界化した日本で無双する～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Nihon  - Ansatsu Ikka no Sannan wa Ikaika shita Nihon de Musou suru -

altTitles.en: Another World in Japan ~The Third Son of the Assassin Family Reigns Supreme in a Transformed Japan~

description.en: As two worlds collide into one, a fateful encounter between the "killer hero" and the "elf princess from another world" has led to a great adventure to defeat the even greater evil!
description.it: Mentre due mondi si scontrano, il fatidico incontro tra l'"eroe assassino" e la "principessa elfa di un altro mondo" porta a una grande avventura per sconfiggere un male ancora più grande!
description.pt-br: Enquanto dois mundos se mesclam em um só, um trágico conto entre o "herói assassino" e a "princesa elfo de outro mundo" leva a uma grande aventura para derrotar um mal ainda maior!

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…

title.en: The Reborn Witch Raises a Templar

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhuǎnshēng Mónǚ Yǎng Chéngle Shèng Diàn Qíshì

altTitles.zh: 转生魔女养成了圣殿骑士

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Witch Became a Templar

description.en: One day, she finds herself reborn as Nielce Glory, the main character in a revenge novel and the strongest witch around—a title she earned by single-handedly taking down the Church. Despite being determined to leave all her grudges behind and face the miserable life she's supposed to have, she ends up saving Harvil, the templar who's fated to kill her later on in the novel.  What was a brief moment of softheartedness has now become a major lifelong headache. And why is the usually cold-hearted Harvil from the novel acting so clingy now?

title.en: Kimi Janakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

altTitles.ja: 君じゃなきゃダメな奴隷少女

altTitles.th: ทาสสาวของผมคนเดียวเท่านั้น

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ja Nakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ 総天然色

description.fr: Shuumatsu No Valkyrie (Valkyrie Apocalypse) arrive maintenant dans le monde du webtoon, dans un nouveau format reprenant l'histoire, mais avec plusieurs nouveautés ! L'histoire commence lorsque les dieux se réunissent en congrès pour décider de laisser l'humanité vivre ou mourir, et décident de détruire l'humanité. Mais une Valkyrie solitaire suggère de laisser les dieux et l'humanité se battre une dernière fois, comme dernier espoir de survie de l'humanité. 13 dieux affronteront 13 champions humains dans des combats en tête-à-tête pour décider si l'humanité vit ou meurt.
description.pt-br:
Agora Shuumatsu No Valkyrie (Record of Ragnarok) chega ao mundo dos Webtoon, num novo formato recontando a história, mas com várias novidades!

A história começa quando os deuses convocam uma convenção para decidir se deixam a humanidade viver ou morrer, e decidem destruir a humanidade. Mas uma Valquíria solitária apresenta a sugestão de deixar os deuses e a humanidade travarem uma última batalha, como última esperança para a sobrevivência contínua da humanidade. 13 deuses lutarão contra 13 campeões humanos em batalhas um contra um para decidir se a humanidade vive ou morre.

description.en:
Bi-Kwang is a handsome young warrior who becomes a drooling mess whenever he sees a pretty girl. Out on the road he meets an extraordinary swordfighter with no name who is searching for a legendary master warrior. Bi-Kwang promises to aid the swordfighter if he lets Bi-Kwang meet his beautiful sister. Of course, it turns out the swordfighter is the sister, Hwa-Rin Dahm, and she must switch identities to keep the plot moving along. Bi-Kwang is immediately smitten, and thus we have a triangle involving only two people.

The story takes place in a setting in each side is trying to unify the Murim as a whole, and while this is taking place, Bi-Kwang who is extremely good at learning martial arts but doesn't want to learn it, gets into a deal where he takes the girl to see her grand father since he was the last person to see him before he disappeared and on the way he encounters many enemies and some friends (who show up from time to time) and he matures since he realizes why martial arts is so important and that he has been using it wrongly. (Source: MAL)

---

**Original manhwa:** [Korean](http://smart.dwci.co.kr/event/yulgang/yulgang_event.asp)

---
**Note:** Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing. The numbering changed a few times, hence why it displays as missing. 
This manhwa was also made into a MMORPG.
description.ru: Эта манхва сосредоточена на жизненном пути молодого человека по имени Хан Би Кван, который сначала не разбирался в боевых искусствах, но его способность облегчить тело была эквивалентна способности чемпиона высшего класса. Он был таинственным образом назначен самым молодым учеником лидера тёмной секты, а также сильнейшим фехтовальщиком военного мира того времени, Чхон Ма Син Ганом, но он выглядел неохотно и казался равнодушным. Его происхождение связано с легендой из прошлого, а именно с бывшим лидером отряда дьявола, который, по слухам, погиб. Он отправляется в приключения, но, в конце концов, влюбляется в красивую пацанку по имени Дам Хва Рин, в любимую внучку одного из сильнейших старейшин белой школы, Императора Меча.

altTitles.ja: きみは, ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!

title.en: Would You Like to Sign the Contract?

description.en: "This is for the Chairman. Is there a problem with that?" These words came back like a dagger, and that day, I died. And I came back to life. From Yoon Suk, who was the director of the best real estate investment company in South Korea, to Kim Dong-kyu, who was a loner, as well as a loser. Momentary frustration, I rose again for revenge. Wait for me. I'll make sure to make them pay for what they did to me. Today, I plan as Yoon Suk and execute as Kim Dong-kyu. For the sake of our revenge.

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

Judge Lee, who believed justice could be realized in the courtroom, did not follow the orders of his superiors and sentenced the conglomerate to life in prison before being killed.  
  
But is it because of the shenanigans he heard as a child ? With all his memories, Lee gets a second life chance.  
  
The world needs him, Lee, the heretic of the judiciary, who knows only justice.
description.ko:
법정 안에서 정의를 실현할 수 있다고 믿었던 판사, 이한영은 
상관의 명령을 따르지 않고, 재벌에게 실형 선고를 내렸다가 살해당하고 만다.
하지만 어렸을 적 들었던 땡중의 헛소리 때문일까?
이한영은 모든 기억을 가지고, 두 번째 삶의 기회를 얻는다. 
오로지 정의밖에 모르는 사법부의 이단아 이한영,
세상이 그를 필요로 한다.
description.ru:
Всегда ратующий за закон и справедливость судья Ли Ханён, отравленный и преданный судом и собственной женой, вернулся в прошлое.

Будучи преисполненым решимостью отомстить предателем и восстановить справедливость, он формирует команду перспективных специалистов из разных областей. Вместе они готовятся нанести удар суду.

Не зная ничего, кроме справедливости, он выносит повторный судебный приговор, после которого все столы в зале заседаний переворачиваются вверх дном.

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

title.en: How to Survive as a Dragon with Time-Limit

altTitles.en: Survival Guide for a terminally-ill Dragon

description.en:
At the end of my terminally-ill life, I found myself reincarnated as a dragon in a webtoon. Once again, a life with a terminal illness, but this time, as a dragon?!

Lois, born with the heritage of the strongest creature in the world with wealth and thousands of years of lifespan as a dragon.

However, facing unpredictable crises at every turn, not knowing when I’ll die—what kind of Bullshit is this?!

It’s too unjust to just quietly die like this. Utilizing the future knowledge I have, I’ll survive like a villain and give this story a twist!
When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...
Cheerful, energetic Akari moves into an old, grand mansion... However, a cursed doll already lives there! Will they be able to get along under the same roof?

altTitles.en: Apotheosis – Elevation to the Status of a God
Principles of Heavens - Zen’s Cultivation of Immortality

description.en: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.
description.fr:
Luo Zheng est un esclave qui était auparavant fils ainé d’une famille riche. En raison du déclin de sa famille et de l’enlèvement de sa sœur par une force puissante, il est désormais piétiné et humilié par les autres. Cependant, le paradis ne scelle jamais toutes les sorties. Un livre ancien laissé par son père révèle une technique divine secrète, donnant au lecteur un immense pouvoir ! Mais que cache ce pouvoir ? Une course contre le destin débute !  
  


---

Official English Alternative:  
<https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/119>
description.it: Luo Zheng, ora un umile schiavo, è nato come il figlio maggiore di una famiglia ricca. A causa del declino della sua famiglia, del rapimento di sua sorella da parte di una forza potente, ora può essere calpestato solo da altri. Tuttavia, il paradiso non chiude mai tutte le uscite. Un libro antico lasciato da suo padre rivela una tecnica divina segreta, dando al lettore un potere immenso! Ma cosa c'è dietro questo potere? Questa è una gara contro il destino.

altTitles.ja-ro: Sei Hantai na Danjo to Inu no Deai

altTitles.en: Encounter Between Polar Opposites and Their Dogs

description.en:
A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk.

 Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend,
 Scary big dog x Powerful girlfriend...
 There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!

title.en: The Sweet Life of a Reincarnation Pro

altTitles.en: Sweet Honey of the Reincarnated Pro

altTitles.ja: 転生のプロが甘い蜜を吸う方法

altTitles.en: How a Former Pro Takes Advantage by Doing an Easy Job

description.en:
This is his 101st reincarnation!
Is this life a fantasy again? Another fantasy? Just as he is disappointed, he hears his mother's mumbling.
He is the youngest prince with no inheritance rights?
No one pays attention to him?
Hooray! This life is a piece of cake.
He is tired of saving the world or fighting desperately for ambition.
What does he want?

Only to enjoy the sweet honey!

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

There exists a limbo realm where the cost of admission is death! Here a new battlefield is populated by the most powerful and fearsome martial artists the world has ever known. Time holds little importance as fighters from many eras and periods of history share the same timeline. From the hit video game series SNK vs. Capcom comes an exciting martial arts event. Capcom's most popular fighting game characters face off against SNK's legendary masters. All your favorite characters are here: Vega, Mai Shiranui, Dimitri - the Vampire, Chun Li, Guile, Akuma, the mysterious Mr. Karate, and others have all gathered for reasons yet to be revealed. Witness explosive battles between Ryu and Kyo Kusanagi, Terry Bogard vs. M. Bison, Iori vs. Balrog and many more seemingly unlikely match-ups. Some fight for glory, some for survival, while others keep secret a more sinister purpose.

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en: The game has emerged into reality, the rules of the world have been turned upside down and humanity has entered the era of becoming players with the world set as a game stage. The only way to become a player is by leveling up to become stronger! The only way to rise to the top of the world! On the day of world fusion Lin Moyue chose to take on the sole hidden class, Necromancer. From then on, Lin Moyue would not die until his summoned creatures died out. “I sit on the throne of bones as the God of the dead and walk between life and death.” “I am a walking catastrophe!”
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

description.en:
Hae Jin has a father who devoted his whole life to finding the national artifacts that were smuggled out of the country.
Then one day, after receiving an unknown “artifact” sent by his father, whom he had lost contact with for a long time, a strange light suddenly came from it, granting Hae Jin a mysterious “power” and a “mission”…
“The magic of the Heavenly Object has been bestowed upon you.”
Thus, an adventure involving the artifacts scattered all over the world, including the ” Three Heavenly Objects”, which contains the soul of the Korean people, begins!

Yeon Hojeong, the first to unite the dark factions as the leader of the Unorthodox Faction, collaborates with the Orthodox Faction to overcome the chaos of the Three Cults. However, he meets an untimely end, entangled in the schemes of the Murim Alliance Leader.

"This really is my home!"

When he opens his eyes, he finds himself in the prestigious and once-destroyed Yeon Clan, a place he never forgot.

"I won’t make a mistake this time. Never again."

Determined to prevent the fall of his family and the future upheaval caused by the Three Cults, he embarks on a relentless journey! This is the struggle of Yeon Hojeong, the eldest son, to unite the martial world.

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

description.en:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
description.ko:
제발 안경 쓴 아저씨는 건들지 말자.
오직 자신의 딸 '민지'를 위해 특수요원직을 관두고 평범함을 선택한 가장 김부장.
그러던 어느 날 민지가 소리소문 없이 사라지고, 김부장은 자신을 감시하는 국가를 적으로 돌리면서까지 딸을 찾아나서기 시작하는데...
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학] 그리고 [인생존망]을 잇는 박태준 유니버스의 공식 스핀오프 작품!
description.ru:
Пожалуйста, не трогайте мужчину в очках.
Менеджер Ким, глава семьи, который бросил работу специализированного агента и выбрал простую жизнь ради своей дочери Мин Джи.
Однажды в один прекрасный день Мин Джи исчезает, не говорив ни слова , и менеджер Ким начинает искать свою дочь, постепенно превращая страну, которая следит за ним, во врага...
description.pt-br: Pai solteiro, gerente de companhia e ex membro das forças especiais. O Sr. Kim vivia uma vida normal até sua filha, Minji, desaparecer. Depois de descobrir que ela poderia estar morta, o Sr. Kim parte em uma busca implacável por informações. Ele irá resgatar Minji a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique destruir tudo e todos que cruzarem seu caminho.
